scripts.build:rust: bun run clean:rust && napi build --platform --release && (mv *.node target/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.build:rust:m1: bun run clean:rust && napi build --platform --target aarch64-apple-darwin --release && (mv *.node target/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.build:rust:linux-x64: bun run clean:rust && napi build --platform --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --release && (mv *.node target/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.build:rust:linux-x64-musl: bun run clean:rust && napi build --platform --target x86_64-unknown-linux-musl --release && (mv *.node target/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.build:rust:linux-arm64: bun run clean:rust && napi build --platform --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu --release && (mv *.node target/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.build:rust:win-x64: bun run clean:rust && napi build --platform --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --release && (mv *.node target/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.build:rust:mac-x64: bun run clean:rust && napi build --platform --target x86_64-apple-darwin --release && (mv *.node target/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.build: npm run build:rust && npm run build:ts
scripts.clean:rust: rm -rf target/napi-rs target/release target/x86_64-* target/.rustc_info.json 2>/dev/null || true
